FuncDef: The display mpls te cspf tedb command displays information about CSPF-based TEDBs that meet specified conditions.
CLIs: display mpls te cspf tedb all
display mpls te cspf tedb all igp-type isis
display mpls te cspf tedb all igp-type ospf
display mpls te cspf tedb overload-node
Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te cspf tedb all
Id      Router-Id       IGP       Process-Id      Area             Link-Count
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te cspf tedb command displays information about CSPF-based TEDBs that meet specified conditions on the control board.
